text: Minin and Pozharsky () is a 1939 Soviet drama movie directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin and Mikhail Doller.В кинотеатрах Москвы отпразднуют День народного единстваМИНИН И ПОЖАРСКИЙ The movie is about the Time of Troubles, Russia's struggle for independence led by Dmitry Pozharsky and Kuzma Minin against the Polish invasion in 1611–1612. It stars Aleksandr Khanov, Boris Livanov, and Boris Chirkov. ==Actors== * Aleksandr Khanov as Kuzma Minin * Boris Livanov as Prince Dmitri Pozharsky * Boris Chirkov as Ra Hetman Jan Karol Chodkiewicz * Lev Sverdlin as Grigori Orlov * Vladimir Moskvin as Stepan Khoroshev, stablehand-conspirator == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1939 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Doller
title: Minin and Pozharsky (movie)
